channel.title: Work History on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Work History on Rusty Eddy

item.title: Eddy Consulting, LLC
item.description: Worked with clients to scope project requirements, establish budgets and schedules, design software architecture and lead teams of engineers through entire software development lifecycles. Project work included but not limited to C; C++; Python; PHP; JavaScript; Java & MySQL.

item.title: AT&T
item.description: Co Architect on a Zero Configuration network provision and configuration management system. We designed a sieres of micro-services to integrate existing company services, and introduced new resources.

item.title: Cloud Trek
item.description: Cloud Automation with Ansible and CloudStack. Automate the installation and provisioning of Linux hosts with ansible.

item.title: DirecTV
item.description: Architectural lead, and software development lead for a new Software Defined Networking Multicast Route Controller. Contributed to the OpenSource SDN controller project ONOS.

item.title: Cisco Systems
item.description: Original member of the Multicast Routing team. Team of 12 responsible for the design, implementation and testing the complete suite of Multicast Routing protocols for the Cisco Carrier Routing System (CRS). Worked this project from early design through product launch into maintenance. read more

item.title: USC ~ ISI
item.description: Led the effort to add IGMP/PIM and Multicast Routing Information Base (MRIB) to the Open Source GateD suite of routing protocols. Lead graduate students and others that would eventually become prominent members of the computer networking community. read more …

item.title: Retix
item.description: Promoted to lead the team of 6 engineers that developed and automated test plans for L2 switches, OSPF, RIP and BGP read more

item.title: Rockwell, Intl. Space Systems Division
item.description: Lead Sysadmin: lead a team of 5 Sysadmins responsible for the use and well being of Engineering Departments 300+ UNIX workstations, servers (Sun, HP, DEC) and network. read more….

item.title: California State University ~ Chancelors Office
item.description: I was hired by the CSU Chancellors Office for a “special” project, a habit I seem to have gotten myself into regularly over the years. read more

item.title: Radian Laser Systems, LLC.
item.description: Laser Calibrator Laser Kiosk Fleetmanagement, Cloud Automation, Containers
